REPORT.code: set nocount on CREATE TABLE #tph ( [id] [int] NOT NULL , [name] [varchar] (15) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (0, N'00:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (1, N'01:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (2, N'02:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (3, N'03:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (4, N'04:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (5, N'05:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (6, N'06:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (7, N'07:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (8, N'08:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (9, N'09:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (10, N'10:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (11, N'11:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (12, N'12:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (13, N'13:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (14, N'14:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (15, N'15:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (16, N'16:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (17, N'17:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (18, N'18:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (19, N'19:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (20, N'20:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (21, N'21:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (22, N'22:00') INSERT INTO #tph (id, name) VALUES (23, N'23:00') select #tph.name as [Час суток], SUM([summa]) as [Сумма] from [repDetails] inner join #tph on (#tph.[id] = DATEPART(hour, [moment])) where ([moment] >= %TIME-START%) and ([moment]<=%TIME-STOP%) GROUP BY #tph.name order by [Час суток] if object_id('tempdb..#tph') is not null DROP TABLE #tph
